Summary: Biochemical reaction from n-desethylabemaciclib to hydroxy-N-desethylabemaciclib. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from abemaciclib to n-desethylabemaciclib. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from hydroxyabemaciclib to hydroxy-N-desethylabemaciclib. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from abemaciclib to hydroxyabemaciclib. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Transport from abemaciclib to abemaciclib. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCG2 or ABCB1.
